modName: Falskaar Companion Lodge by Brendan62 bsa fixed
summary:
This is a medium sized Cabin near Falskaar Lighthouse features Weapons Room, Guest room, Alchemy Room, lots of safe storage, pool
Kitchen & staff rooms. Pet Dog, Bath all nicely furnished and includes 2 companions
Both can be companions and can be married. Note they are all high level.

descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-5.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/10243-1-1430138382.png[/img]

BSA ISSUE IS NOW SORTED PLEASE REDOWNLOAD PLEASE DOWNLOAD ALL UPDATES
***************Very special thanks to Tamira for her help and time in the CK to get me the list of missing files. Without her help this would not have been fixed**********************************

This home is just unreleased mod i did awhile ago which i moved to Falskaar worldspace due to a lack of comfy player homes there. This mod is mostly just copy and paste from my other mods both released and working on. Its just for eye candy. This mod will not be updated as im now working on other things.

Description
===========
This is a medium sized Cabin near Falskaar Lighthouse features Weapons Room, Guest room, Alchemy Room, lots of safe storage, pool
Kitchen & staff rooms. Pet Dog, Bath all nicely furnished and includes 2 companions
Both can be companions and can be married. Note they are all high level.
Nice view from balcony, nice gardens, 1 Horse, Outdoor workshop with all cons Forge, tanning racks etc
Ship fast travel to Solitude
This is themed more so for a mage character who is into nature so dont complain about a lack of weapon racks etc the are a few around the house just no wall ones
Note some high level items around the place if you dont like that dont pick them up.
The NPCs are all high level if you dont like that dont get them to follow you.

Credits

MJY for more resources
Tamira/Stroti for more geat resources
If ive left you out please let me know

Install
=======
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Copy files to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\


In case of any trouble, please don\'t hesitate to contact me at http://www.skyrimrealestate.com/forum/index.php and I will try to help you
to the best of my ability.

Please visit http://www.skyrimrealestate.com home of the best house mods for Skyrim

You must contact me and obtain my permission before re-packaging any part of
this mod. This file is not to be hosted at any site of which im not a member without prior contact.
